div.p: My day is quite manic, it’s a very busy environment so you have the phones going the whole time, you have emails that you have to check,
you’ve got appointments to go to, you’ve got viewings to do, you’ve got valuations to go to, so it’s about firstly structuring your morning
and making sure what are your priorities and what else do you need to achieve within that day and make a lot of space for everything else
that’s going to be thrown at you because there’s a lot of unexpectedness.
